item.description:
Please rsvp HERE (Note: I asked the manager and this party starts at 10PM, not 9:30 as it says on here)

 

For Menu & directions click HERE

 

This event is cross posted with Social Fun and Facebook

Please Join me for dinner before the singing and merriment begins! Please indicate in your rsvp comment of you are "coming for dinner" at 9 or 'Just drinks" at 10

 

Join us for our annual "Ugly Sweater Holiday Party! next Friday December 21 starting at 10:00 pm! Choose your sweater wisely as we will be giving prizes out for the most creative ones out there! Sponsored by our friends at Coors Light there will be games and prizes as well as singing and much more. RSVP as soon as possible. Gonna be a blast!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be seated at a table wearing a red santa hat with reindeer antlers
item.name: Ugly Sweater Holiday Party (near Harvard Sq)
